name: BeatCubes for Windows
description:
⚠️BeatCubes v0.1.3 has been removed and hidden for download for Windows computers due to multiple bugs noticed. It is still playable in the web version of BeatCubes, available at my profile. Currently, BeatCubes v0.1.2 is available for download before this problem is fixed.⚠️

BeatCubes for Windows is a Windows rythm game developed by WasThatHaze. It is coded and maintained on Scratch, and is published here on itch.io.

The Scratch project convertion to .exe used https://packager.turbowarp.org/ .
